source_note: State baseline derived from Arkansas Department of Energy and Environment (ADEE) Division of Environmental Quality programs.

organics.guidance: Composting and yard waste recycling encouraged; not required by state law.
organics.notes: Little Rock and Fayetteville support organics drop-offs.

paper_cardboard.guidance: Recycle clean paper and cardboard; flatten before placing in bins.
paper_cardboard.notes: Waxed or contaminated paper not accepted.

glass_containers.guidance: Recycle bottles and jars (rinsed, no lids) where accepted.
glass_containers.notes: Glass not collected curbside in all cities.

metal_containers.guidance: Recycle aluminum and steel/tin cans; rinse before recycling.

plastics.guidance: Recycle bottles and containers labeled #1â€“#2; check local programs for others.
plastics.notes: Plastic film and foam not accepted.

beverage_containers_crv.guidance: No container deposit or refund program in Arkansas.

household_batteries.guidance: Recycle rechargeable batteries through HHW or retail drop-offs.

e_waste.guidance: E-waste accepted at local recycling events and facilities.

plastic_bags_and_film.guidance: Plastic bags and film not accepted in curbside bins.

bulky_items.guidance: Bulky waste must be scheduled for pickup or taken to landfill.
